pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Bloc Québécois leader Yves-François Blanchet | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with Bloc Québécois leader Yves-François Blanchet. Mr. Blanchet had the opportunity to present the Prime Minister with his party’s priorities for the upcoming federal budget. They took the opportunity to discuss these priorities. This meeting follows Minister of Finance Bill Morneau’s consultations with the opposition parties, as part of an ongoing engagement process.
